title: Mini-Ep 163: Aquaphor Influencers
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 163: Aquaphor Influencers
itunes:subtitle: Kate raves about an e.l.f. moisturizer and Doree fills her tub and gets her soak on. Then, an aesthetician writes in to begrudgingly praise Aquaphor, a caller asks about the best earplugs for blocking out noise, and listeners call in with their financi...
description:
Kate raves about an e.l.f. moisturizer and Doree fills her tub and gets her soak on. Then, an aesthetician writes in to begrudgingly praise Aquaphor, a caller asks about the best earplugs for blocking out noise, and listeners call in with their financial tips and goals. 


Activity of the Week: Do one financial thing you’ve been putting off. 


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

 

  • STORYWORTH - For $20 off, visit storyworth.com/forever35.
  • ULTA BEAUTY - See the joy this holiday season! Shop in store, curbside pickup or online at ulta.com.
  • THIRDLOVE - Get 15% off your first purchase when you go to thirdlove.com/forever.
  • LITERATI - go to literati.com/FOREVER35 for 25% off your first two orders. 
  • HELLOFRESH - Get $20 off your first four boxes when you go to hellofresh.com/forever80 and enter promo code FOREVER80.
  • CALM - For 40% off a Calm Premium subscription, head to calm.com/forever35.
  • GLOSSIER - For a limited time, new customers can get 10% off your first order at Glossier.com/podcast/FOREVER35.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
